import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect'; import {selectCartItems, selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import './checkout.styles.scss' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' const Checkout = ({cartItems,total}) =>(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem=> ( ) ) }
TOTAL: ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems:selectCartItems, total:selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Checkout);
